simulating_walls.md
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 # simulate a world with closed walls
2 
3 In order to simulate an indoor world, source your ROS environment and catkin workspace, and then launch gazebo.launch with the willowgarage world.
4 
5 ```console
6 foo@bar:~$ source /opt/ros/melodic/setup.bash
7 foo@bar:~$ source /path/to/catkin_ws/devel/setup.bash
8 foo@bar:~$ roslaunch patrolbot_gazebo gazebo.launch world:=worlds/willowgarage.world
9 ```
10 
11 ![A Patrolbot robot inside Gazebo.](img/patrolbot_gazebo.png "A Patrolbot robot inside Gazebo.")
